channel.title: youtube on jamesm.blog
channel.description: Recent content in youtube on jamesm.blog

item.title: List of Self Improvement Videos
item.description: YouTube Videos TED Talks 5 hindrances to self-mastery | Master Shi Heng YI - serene talk about self-discovery A simple way to break a bad habit | Judson Brewer - Psychiatrist Judson Brewer studies the relationship between mindfulness and addiction Extreme Ownership | Jocko Willink - Jocko Willink explains from personal experience how war teaches you the most when things go wrong Getting stuck in the negatives (and how to get unstuck) | Alison Ledgerwood - Alison Ledgerwood investigates how certain ways of thinking about an issue tend to stick in people’s heads Got a meeting?
item.content:encoded:
YouTube Videos

TED Talks

  • 5 hindrances to self-mastery | Master Shi Heng YI - serene talk about self-discovery
  • A simple way to break a bad habit | Judson Brewer - Psychiatrist Judson Brewer studies the relationship between mindfulness and addiction
  • Extreme Ownership | Jocko Willink - Jocko Willink explains from personal experience how war teaches you the most when things go wrong
  • Getting stuck in the negatives (and how to get unstuck) | Alison Ledgerwood - Alison Ledgerwood investigates how certain ways of thinking about an issue tend to stick in people’s heads
  • Got a meeting? Take a walk | Nilofer Merchant - Nilofer Merchant suggests a small idea that just might have a big impact on your life and health
  • How To Eliminate Self Doubt Forever & The Power of Your Unconscious Mind | Peter Sage - Peter Sage exposes some of the hidden reasons and unconscious patterns that cause us to self-sabotage and explains what we can do to change them
  • How to Grow as a Person (And Why It Sucks) | Johnny Crowder - Johnny Crowder details the difficulties and pitfalls of trying to grow as a person
  • How to Love Yourself to the Core | Jen Oliver - there is an epidemic of low self-worth on this planet that will only be remedied with one person at a time committing to expressing unwavering gratitude, compassion and reverence within
  • How to motivate yourself to change your behavior | Tali Sharot - Tali Sharot reveals three ingredients to doing what’s good for yourself
  • Sleep is your superpower | Matt Walker - in this deep dive into the science of slumber, Matt Walker shares the wonderfully good things that happen when you get sleep
  • The art of choosing | Sheena Iyengar - Sheena Iyengar studies how we make choices & how we feel about the choices we make
  • Power of Fitness | Vincent Lam - why exercise is an important part of a healthy lifestyle
  • What I learned from going blind in space | Chris Hadfield - Chris Hadfield paints a vivid portrait of how to be prepared for the worst in space (and life)
  • Why reading matters | Rita Carter - speaking is already in our genes. But reading is not. Until about 100 years ago most people didn’t do it all. When we read fiction especially, we create new pathways in our brain

item.title: List of Music Production Courses & Reviews
item.description: Music Production Courses General Ask Video Ableton, Cubase, Logic Pro, Native Instruments … Born to Produce Groove3 Ableton, BitWig Studio, Cubase, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Maschine … macProVideo Point Blank Music School Steinberg Udemy Music Theory ThinkSpace Education General Composition Harmony One Harmony Two How To Write Music Learn Music Theory Piano Lessons Flowkey - practice notes and chords interactively and receive instant feedback Piano Genius - how to start playing your favorite songs now without the time and frustration of traditional lessons Piano University - become a piano superhuman Pianote - online piano lessons for all skill levels Skoove - complete online piano learning method YouTube Channels Mastering․com Mix with the Masters School of Synthesis Underdog Electronic Music School Music Production Reviews YouTube Channels Andrew Huang - Canadian YouTube personality, musician & video producer Andertons - music hardware & software reviews Doctor Mix - weekly reviews, tips & techniques on music production, mixing and mastering Guy Michelmore / ThinkSpace Education In The Mix - simplifying the recording, production, mixing and mastering process Jef Gibbons - video production, photography & music production Nu-Trix The Synth Guy - synthesizer reviews & music production Sanjay C - music production, gear & tips Simeon Amburgey - virtual instruments from developers all over the world Sound On Sound - recording & music technology magazine Venus Theory - music production & reviews Woody Piano Shack - music production & reviews Music Producers Glenn Main - Norwegian electronic music composer State Azure - electronic music producer from the UK Music Software & Plugin Deals Audio Plugin Guy
item.content:encoded:
Music Production Courses

General

  • Ask Video
    • Ableton, Cubase, Logic Pro, Native Instruments …
  • Born to Produce
  • Groove3
    • Ableton, BitWig Studio, Cubase, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Maschine …
  • macProVideo
  • Point Blank Music School
  • Steinberg
  • Udemy

Music Theory

  • ThinkSpace Education
    • General Composition
      • Harmony One
      • Harmony Two
      • How To Write Music
      • Learn Music Theory

Piano Lessons

  • Flowkey - practice notes and chords interactively and receive instant feedback
  • Piano Genius - how to start playing your favorite songs now without the time and frustration of traditional lessons
  • Piano University - become a piano superhuman
  • Pianote - online piano lessons for all skill levels
  • Skoove - complete online piano learning method

YouTube Channels

  • Mastering․com
  • Mix with the Masters
  • School of Synthesis
  • Underdog Electronic Music School

Music Production Reviews

YouTube Channels

  • Andrew Huang - Canadian YouTube personality, musician & video producer
  • Andertons - music hardware & software reviews
  • Doctor Mix - weekly reviews, tips & techniques on music production, mixing and mastering
  • Guy Michelmore / ThinkSpace Education
  • In The Mix - simplifying the recording, production, mixing and mastering process
  • Jef Gibbons - video production, photography & music production
  • Nu-Trix The Synth Guy - synthesizer reviews & music production
  • Sanjay C - music production, gear & tips
  • Simeon Amburgey - virtual instruments from developers all over the world
  • Sound On Sound - recording & music technology magazine
  • Venus Theory - music production & reviews
  • Woody Piano Shack - music production & reviews

Music Producers

  • Glenn Main - Norwegian electronic music composer
  • State Azure - electronic music producer from the UK

Music Software & Plugin Deals

  • Audio Plugin Guy
